jd: From: KhushankChauhan, Source Infotech khushank@sourceinfotech.com Reply to: khushank@sourceinfotech.com Senior Technical 365 CRM ArchitectSeattle Washington (Remote)USC/GCD365 Technical Architect (CRM)• Ideal candidate will be someone who has strong D365 CE & Power Platform knowledge & .Net & cloud architecture and has implemented Enterprise solution end to end, understanding of Azure services and Design patterns • Worked on at least two large end-to-end D365 CE or Power Apps - Model Driven implementation as a dev lead or Architect. • Sound knowledge in Power Platform including Power Pages, Model Driven, Power Automate, Power BI and Canvas Apps• Writing technical specs/ technical user stories/design documents• Ensure all solutions exhibit high levels of performance, security, scalability, maintainability, and appropriate reusability and reliability upon deployment • Be the Voice of the Customer; Share insights and best practices, and connect with Engineering teams to remove key blockers • Security role and permission• Deployment including CICD and test automation • Configuration/Customization - BPF, Email configuration, Ribbon XML, Forms, views, etc.• Good coding skills in C#, building PCF controls, Azure Functions, TypeScript, and React (preferred). • Web resources/External components reference• Integration and data migration (using ADF) concepts• Dataverse – Entity, fields, publisher, etc.• Business process Automation – Plugin, Web API, workflows, cloud flows, business rules• Azure and AI fundamentals • Coordination and guiding team• Good knowledge in compliance - data, accessibility, UI/UX, Security • Experience working with Offshore team• Excellent communication skills.
